metadata.Title: CVE-2018-12181 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Stack overflow in corrupted bmp for EDK II may allow unprivileged user to potentially enable denial of service or elevation of privilege via local access.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-12181` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ovmf - 0~20180205.c0d9813c-2ubuntu0.2
qemu-efi - 0~20180205.c0d9813c-2ubuntu0.2
qemu-efi-aarch64 - 0~20180205.c0d9813c-2ubuntu0.2
qemu-efi-arm - 0~20180205.c0d9813c-2ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: edk2 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0~20180205.c0d9813c-2ubuntu0.2').
